Posts.Content: Feb 28, 2012 01:47PM Justasupporter wrote: I am just a mom who became friendly with another mom at the school bus stop.  She was just diagnosed with Stage 4 IBC and given a slim chance of survival.  I have been reading all of your posts and all of you are so heroic.  I can't imagine what you are going through.  What can someone do to help if at all, to another woman in this situation.  I haven't said the "you look good" and now I am glad!  I have just listened to her.  She has a grown son and two elementary school age children.  Maybe you all can educate me and some others who are reading these posts.
Posts.Title: I was rude ma111 katie31
